name: Daniel K. Inouye
order2: Chairman of the Senate Committee on Appropriations
order3: Chairman of the Senate Select Committee on Intelligence
order4: Chairman of the Senate Committee on Indian Affairs
predecessor4: Mark Andrews (1987), Ben N. Campbell (2001), Ben N. Campbell (2001)
successor4: John McCain (1995), Ben N. Campbell (2001), Ben N. Campbell (2003)
order5: Chairman of the Senate Committee on Commerce, Science and Transportation
order7: Member of the Hawaii Territorial Senate

alma_mater: University of Hawaii at Manoa, George Washington University
